There were no other sightings in Sedona on or around September 15th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 2 rectangular bright light columns on face of Submarine Rock, Sedona.
divs: sighting detailsat 10:40 pm, tuesday september 15, 2009, my neighbor knocked on my door to inform me that there was something strange on the face of the mountain behind us (wilson mountain, sedona). while i was getting dressed, i happened to look out my apartment window that faces the mountain, and i noticed this extremely bright rectangular (column) of light, perfectly rectangular in shape on the face of the mountain. when i arrived next door and made my way to the deck facing the mountain, there were now two columns, identical in shape on the face of the mountain, one slightly up and behind the other column. we estimated that, from the distance we were (approx. 1\2 mile), these must have been approximately 15 feet in width, and about 40 feet tall. they both were separated in 4 segments, equal in size, (as if you were to stack four smaller rectangles equal in shape on top of each other), and within minutes there seemed to be these "orange" spheres of light blinking and appearing in the area around these columns. as i, my neighbor and her 21 year old son stood on the deck, i proceeded to set up my telescope to get a better look. this was all taking place in the dark, on a perfectly clear starlit night. while setting up the telescope, my neighbor was watching them with binoculars. she commented that these almost looked like large "windows" or doorways in the side of the mountain, which after looking through the binoculars, i agreed. as we were watching, the column behind the first suddenly became extremely bright. after setting up the telescope and trying to angle it in the direction of these lights, the brightest column suddenly dimmed, and remained visible for about 20 minutes... then totally disappeared. the first column remained, but dimmed as well. i was unable to focus the telescope, and so i asked my neighbor to see if she might be successful. she was able to angle the scope, which showed what appeared to be something that resembled a "shuttered" rectangular window. all three of us witnessed this, and initially argued whether this was a house ( which we knew no house existed at that level or height on the mountain.. but agreed that we would keep an open mind until daylight. note: we left the telescope angled at this sight, and looking out the deck in the morning it was clear that there was no houses or buildings where these 'lights' or doorways\windows appeared. ) after viewing this "shuttered" formation for about 10 minutes, it too disappeared. for the next 30 minutes, there was nothing more on the face of the mountain. i have seen orbs, orange lights, and the like moving about the formations here.. but i've never witnessed such a thing as this, as large or tall, and perfectly shaped. i believe without a doubt that there are 'bases' of some sort or portals that exist here in sedona among the formations.
